Description: This auction is for a NEAR MINT / LIKE NEW pair of 1990's 58[]14MM VINTAGE B&L RAY BAN L0216 G15 OUTDOORMAN AVIATOR SUNGLASSES w/CASE!!!These sunglasses are in NEAR MINT condition, NOT A VISIBLE BLEMISH ON THE LENSES. The bottom of bridge is engraved with B&L RAY-BAN 58[]14. The top of bridge is engraved with B&L RAY-BAN USA. The overall condition of hinges excellent, nice and tight. Temple cable arms are firm/sturdy & lenses are in super clear/crisp/shiny/ NEAR MINT condition. Lenses imprinted with BL. When held up & seen lenses through light absolutely no scratches!! You have to see it to believe it!!When worn, overall view is very clear, like seeing through a new pair of Aviators. The color of impact/scratch resistant constant density G15 UV glass lens is Green/Neutral Gray. Please see pictures for all details & markings.Case is also in Excellent Condition, no tears or marks on leather. Snap button in great shape and works well!Also included is the original Bausch & Lomb Limited Warranty and Product Registration paperwork!! (copyright 1996) See pictures for detail on condition. Additional pictures available upon request!!Willing to combine shipping on multiple items. Item ships with insurance!! Sorry, NO INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!!! NOTE: Sold “as is”…please ask questions prior to bidding…Thanks!!
